entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Introducing Log buffering abstraction #104129
    9.0.0
  • Occasionally hitting error MSB6006: "csc.dll" exited with code 139 on linux #104123
  • Tensor<T> and supporting types, part 3 #104117
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Removal of ConditionalSelect's operands when mask is AllFalse/AllTrue #104116
    9.0.0
  • Xcode 16-beta compilation error: non-private labels cannot appear between .cfi_startproc / .cfi_endproc pairs #104105
  • [API Proposal]: GC.WaitForPendingFinalizersAsync #104101
  • [x64][SysV] Pass NO_CLASS eightbytes #104098
  • .NET 8 DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles with MatchCasing.CaseInsensitive fails on Linux #104096
  • [API Proposal]: Enums should implement IParsable / ISpanParsable #104091
  • [API Proposal]: Move `TagBuilder` into System.Text namespace #104090
  • Update dogfooding page for .NET 9 #104088
  • [NAOT][Maui] iOS Maui sample app startup getting slower #104083
  • [API Proposal]: RSA PSS salt length #104080
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 6/25/2024 5:29:23 PM #104107
  • runtime.proj invocation and non-deterministic restore #104077

Closed

  • Enum.ToObject(typeof(MyEnum), 3.0) does not throw an ArgumentException #95697
  • error MSB6006: "csc.dll" exited with code 139 #57558
    Future
  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.File_GetSetTimes_SafeFileHandle_Pathless.WritingShouldUpdateWriteTime_After_SetLastAccessTime #103457
    9.0.0
  • Vector128<T>.Indices is not intrinsified on ARM64 #104075
    9.0.0
  • Optimize out write barriers for fields in ref-like structs #9512
    9.0.0
  • Error machine code generate for `bswap` with xarch backend #104114
  • [Question] tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror Unix/CoreCLR skip #104095
  • _statusCode of System.Diagnostics.Activity was set to be ActivityStatusCode.Ok explicitly, but somehow got modified to be ActivityStatusCode.Error #104068
  • [Duplicate] Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Configuration Binder.BindArray() binding adding to the initialized Collections, not replacing #104085
  • Specific Win10/11 Proxysettings cause wrong result in WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy.GetProxy(...) #91045
    9.0.0
  • Windows system proxy URL behavior differs from IE/Edge/Chrome #38670
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions #102320
    9.0.0
  • Opt-out switch for disabled OCSP Stapling by default #96395
    9.0.0
  • Segmentation fault when running in emulated amd64 container on M1 Mac #94909
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 9 Regressions on 2/27/2024 9:28:58 PM #99417
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common 2/28/2024 9:23:39 AM #99318
    9.0.0
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization on Node, Windows throws with "non-standard" format of era #95623
    Future
  • [6.0] [warning] [android] [mono] libc.so.6 error - GLIBC_2.28 not found in node20, using node16 instead. Need OS upgrade. #98313
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 4/22/2024 7:01:47 PM #102382
    9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization investigate/implement NSCalendarIdentifier not implemented calendars #93199
    Future
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `runtime/main` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #104023
  • [Android][arm] Algorithm 'RC2' not supported on Android causing failures in X509Certificates tests #104030
  • BIGENDIAN not defined while building eventpipe on s390x #104036
  • Inefficient register allocation in simple method which dereferences a span #13466
  • System.Reflection.Emit value type mismatch trying to create a value type #103796
    9.0.0
  • Vectorized implementation of Log/Pow/Cbrt/RootN is broken for some inputs #100535
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add NULL checks to GetClassWithPossibleAV #104128
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix infinite loop in IGenericCacheEntry.CreateAndCache #104126
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add QEMU detection check #104125
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Adding support for Guid.CreateVersion7 #104124
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • [coreclr] Remove CatchHardwareExceptionHolder #104121
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • STJ: Support serialization callbacks for collection and dictionary types #104120
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement `ShiftLeftLogical`, `ShiftRightArithmetic`, `ShiftRightLogical` #104119
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move protected member check in the class #104118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Add support for `SwiftIndirectResult` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104111
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Review temp file name generator." #104109
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, os-browser
  • Improve perf of JsonValue.CreateFromElement by calling ValueKind once #104108
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • re-enable BinaryFormatter tests, fixes #103447 #104104
    area-System.Resources
  • Convert Array.IsSimpleCopy and CanAssignArray type to managed #104103
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable tests with WaitForPendingFinalizers in gcstress testing #104102
    GCStress, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Revert "[vm] fix confusing use of m_pCanonMT (NFC) (#102936)" #104100
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Optimize VectorT.ConditionalSelect for constant masks #104092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Part-2:Add runtime assembly code (*.S) files in nativeaot. #104084
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Make consistent HybridGlobalization checks #104082
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Add user_events to the GC event level caching logic #104079
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Testing for "emscripten bump 3.1.56" #104078
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [ios][HybridGlobalization] Fix default culture #104071
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ConvertToint64`, `ConvertToUInt64`, `ConvertToDouble` and `ConvertToSingle` #104069
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [tests] Use net8.0 for the project used to restore workload manifest nuget, instead of net6.0 #104067
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Arm64/SVE: Add support to handle predicate registers as callee-trash #104065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve

Merged

  • Reduce jobs on sanitizer runs #104115
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add ValueType to the core types used by ref emit #104055
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Revert Enum.ToObject parsing of float/double enums #104110
    area-System.Runtime
  • Delete ARM32-specific interface dispatch code #104024
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix assertion/possible deadlock in thread shutdown in the presence of ThreadStatics on collectible assemblies #104003
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update the downlevel implicit versions #104112
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [mini] Use atomics instead of loader lock for JIT wrappers and trampolines #104038
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Optimize out write barriers for fields in ref-like structs #103503
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Vector128<T>.Indices intrinsic on arm64 #104081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-enable eventsourceerror for Unix/CoreCLR #104099
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [LoongArch64] Part-3:Add changes in ObjectWriter component about nativeaot. #104087
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Optimize performance of `Measurement` constructor #103978
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Add support for Sve.DuplicateSelectedScalarToVector() #103228
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • update parsing for manually configured proxy on Windows #103328
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Guard remaining IErrorInfo usage under FEATURE_COMINTEROP #103510
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable sending activation to dispatch queue threads #102887
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add AppContext switch for OCSP Stapling #100917
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Add System.Text fuzzing for encoders #103968
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Change X509CertificateLoader to wrap unsupported algorithms with a CryptographicException #104040
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • bump npm dependencies and lock file format #103639
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Show the linker cmake is using #104045
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Enable `TryFormat_MatchesToString` for `HybridGlobalization` #104026
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test
  • Suppress another credscan finding in TestData.cs #104086
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert compile-native.proj to use local props #104072
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Convert some more array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Minimize locking duration for decommitLock #103996
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Set value for BIGENDIAN #104056
    area-Infrastructure
  • [LoongArch64] Part-1:Change EmitPC in LoongArch64Emitter.cs. #104066
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Ensure GetMemoryStatus behave consistently between Windows and Linux in case a container limit is changed without calling RefreshMemoryLimit #103963
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetNestedExceptionData #103668
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ARm64/Sve: Fix the SVE_ComputeAddress* #104039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve

Updated

  • ARM64-SVE: Add SVE registers to pal context #103801
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE APIs `CreateMaskForFirstActiveElement` and `CreateMaskForNextActiveElement` #104002
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: ARM64 - Added SVE APIs `ExtractLastVector`, `ExtractLastScalar`, `ExtractAfterLastVector`, `ExtractAfterLastScalar` #103847
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • UnixCommandLinePing.cs: improve searching for the system ping binary #103838
    area-System.Net, os-linux, community-contribution
  • Use the same method to generate DllImportAttribute in local methods and P/Invoke forwarders #103973
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • Extract shared IL pattern analysis to a class #103701
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix type parsing issues in ILLink and ILC #104060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix definite assignment error in regex source gen for some lazy loops #104007
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2484100 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Update mono to support Unsafe.BitCast #103915
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Avoid MakeGenericMethod in XmlSerializer #102482
    area-Serialization
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #103937
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 9.0.0
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix #103485 #103935
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make GC stress usable with Libraries tests #103738
    test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • [x64][SysV] Classify empty structs for passing like padding #103799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix the race condition issue of aot_module loading #103975
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Add CancellationToken support for LoadIntoBufferAsync #103991
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Update Mono to handle various other vector bitcast APIs #104049
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [nomerge] [GC] Add verification and logging to region_free_list #104061
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0 staging] Port fix for 103477 to 8.0 #103918
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.8
  • [release/6.0] Surface error when `emcc -version` failed. #103967
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.33
  • [Android] Fix SslStreamCertificateContext empty custom trust store exception #104016
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Subtract prior entry size when adding entry to cache #103931
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Fix #97736 in MemoryCache.cs with a lock around the TriggerOvercapacityC... method #103992
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] change StartsWithPayloadHeader to accept a Span rather than array #103636
    new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • Improve getStaticFieldContent for classes without cctors #104054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] More TypeName APIs #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization
  • Fix AV in GcInfoDecoder #103938
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Accelerate Vector128<long>::op_Multiply on x64 #103555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, avx512
  • [QUIC] Adding `CompleteWritesAsync` #104032
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [H/3] Wait for `WritesClosed` and `Dispose` as fire-and-forget #104035
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix static-lib AOT Mono builds #103988
    area-Build-mono
  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Configuration] #103805
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Print linking instructions for NativeLib=static #103960
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Repair very old merge damage and update comments #104052
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Set AnyCPU for ProjectReference to source generators #103819
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Try SimdUnicode for Utf8 validation #103860
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Delete runtime-main mirror #2620

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change wwwroot to Assets in Razor Class Library #41818
  • Installer kills software without asking #41815

Closed

  • `dotnet tool install --global` reinstalls even if the same version is already present #40818
    9.0.1xx
  • .NET version 8.0.302 #41813
  • After installing the .NET 9.0 Preview 6 SDK, failed to install wasm-experimental/wasm-tools workload with error "Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current' version '9.0.0-preview.6.24319.1' is lower" #41777
  • Regex generated by GeneratedRegex attribute can produce code with CS0165. #41799

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding SignalR CustomAwaitable feature switch #41832
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Adjust SB license and content test triggers #41831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add xunit configuration to increase test logging #41829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid reinstall tool already installed #41746
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add trigger to run license tests when baseline or test changes are made #41828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow runtime binary into the VMR #41736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update package table for preview 6 #41772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add comments to resources to instruct loc team about 'fixed' portions of the strings #41631
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41716
  • feat: Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #40416
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add Mono Stage 2 Leg to VMR SB #41606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Minimize container dependency redistribution #41740
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Plan for addressing torn SDK builds #41790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: Allow `with` keyword for classes containing constructor expecting itself #8246

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Extending patterns to "as" #8210

PullRequests

Merged

  • Create FK-2024-05-26.md #8248
  • Provide details about representation of instance members in metadata in extensions.md #8242

Updated

  • Update first-class Span speclet with LDM decisions #8241
  • Extract open issues and organize Expressions section #8209

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create LangVersion 13 #74194
    17.12
  • CS7038: Failed to emit module if new collection syntax is used with an implicit ImmutableArray operator. #74185
  • CodeGen for defaulted collection expression elements #74184
  • Code Analysis rule CA1860 gives a biased message #74179
  • Precompile compile-time declared Lambda Expression. #74178
  • Suggestion to Include Criteria for Identifying Generated Code in AnalysisContext.ConfigureGeneratedCodeAnalysis() Documentation #74177

Closed

  • IEventSymbol.DeclaringSyntaxReferences Syntax is VariableDeclaratorSyntax not EventDeclarationSyntax #74187
  • LanguageServerCleansUpOnUnexpectedJsonRpcDisconnectAsync is flaky #69465
    17.11
  • Suppressing one IDExxxx rule from a multi-rule EditorConfig setting is not possible if EnforceCodeStyleInBuild is enabled #73858
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.dotnetVS-35026.97 #74176
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35026.134 #74175

PullRequests

Created

  • Address PR feedback on https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/74132 #74193
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2484077 #74192
    auto-merge
  • Fix scenario where lightbulbs weren't being displayed #74191
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Make project system workspace transformation functions resilient to being attempted twice #74189
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Display lifted primary constructor parameters in watch window … #74188
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add tests for consuming instance extension methods from VB and previous version of C# compiler. #74182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

Merged

  • Cherry-pick 74149 to 17.11 #74186
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move PEPropertySymbol to use the same UncommonFields pattern that PEMethodSymbol uses #74132
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Report diagnostic for field and value in property accessors when used as primary expressions only #74164
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • UI improvements for the Copilot rename feature #74149
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid failing docs check on temporary network errors #74181
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Sign `VSSetup/Installer/Roslyn_Preview.zip` #74103
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix error recovery for various nested conversion scenarios #74089
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74195
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • New generator apis #74127
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Better detect equivalence in our strong name provider #74151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Escaping also considers record structs #74125
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.12
  • Do not store temp of ref conditional operator by value #74116
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.12
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Parse `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnumerableConditionalWeakTable and WeakEvent #74160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consume new Razor EA #74134
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to move people over to System.Threading.Lock #74170
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add generated semantic search API list #73966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74129
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Fix 'invert if' refactor to properly enclose #region/#endregion blocks #74145
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Cherry pick #74034 #74174
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Rename the record parameter when its property get renamed #74168
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • angular 18 build isuue with eventResource #56495
  • SignalR - Browser/TypeScript client - the Server-Sent Event keep alive ping fails to renew the access token if a 401 Unauthorized happens on the ping #56494
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #56493
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #56492
  • Facilitate deserializing ValidationProblemDetails out of HttpResponseMessage #56486
  • Blazor static SSR support to override ParsableConverter for mapping non invariant DateTime values #56485
  • Blazor Static SSR ParsableConverter mapping error message customization #56484
  • HybridCache: Enable setting expiration based on value in factory #56483
  • After adding NuGet Package Microsoft.Extensions.Apidescription.Server to ASP.NET Web Project, publish failed with error: Unable to find service type 'Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescriptions.IDocumentProvider' in loaded assemblies #56481
  • \u3000 character always encoded even when UnicodeRanges.CjkSymbolsandPunctuation is allowed #56480
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56479
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #56477
  • Identity RemoveClaimsAsync(userById, claimsToRemove) method is resetting the primary key to the last removed claim's primary key #56476
  • IOptions<HealthCheckServiceOptions> seems to be registered in CreateSlimBuilder even though HealthChecks are not #56475
  • Blazor Server - InvokeAsync(StateHasChanged) does not work correctly with UI streaming. #56474

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclose #56469
  • Perf regression: json #56478
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot #56462
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi should generate references to shared schemas rather then duplicating them #56264
    9.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable async key ring update in Mvc.FunctionalTests #56491
    area-mvc
  • Remove IIS launch profiles from templates #56489
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Switch to dSAS for internal runtimes #56488
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Switch to dSAS for internal runtimes #56487
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Quarantine RunAsync_CanFilterHealthChecks #56246
    area-healthchecks, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `1d17ea1` #56232
    area-infrastructure
  • Annotate SignalR server for native AOT #56460
    area-signalr
  • Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #55347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview7
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10 #56275
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add OpenAPI operation and schema transformer interfaces #56395
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • Add overloads for problem and validation problem results that accept `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<,>>` #56368
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException Throw methods in SendFileResponseExtensions..CheckRange #56420
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Set OpenAPI discriminators for JSON polymorphic types #56466
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add hidden input for easier binding in static edit forms #55989
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Optimize RouteTableFactory.DetectAmbiguous routes #56415
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Chain runtime .Msi's instead of .Exe's in hosting bundle #56459
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Debugging MAUI gives "Could not found a valid Xcode app bundle at..." #23326
  • Setting background color on the Searchbar does nothing on iOS #23325
  • `Element`: NRE by accessing `RealParent` #23320
    .NET 8 SR7
  • [iOS] ViewCell not resized when HasUnevenRows is enabled and cell content changes #23319
  • Unable to click Label Spans position in CollectionView item #23318
  • Android: Specific Avif image fails to load #23316
  • `LoadFile` in `src/Core/src/Platform/iOS/MauiWKWebView.cs` removes directories. #23315
  • [MAUI] Height is not considered for ViewCell #23312
  • [MAUI]I1_Layout-Horizontal list for Text page has too much blank space. #23311
  • [MAUI] I2_Spacing - Changing the vertical and horizontal spacing values, images and location are truncated #23310
  • [MAUI] Unable to scroll up and down #23309
  • [MAUI]I3_Sizing - 'MesaureAllItems 'and 'MesaureFirstItem ' Options not Responding in I3-Variable size items for Vertical list #23307
  • [MAUI]I1_Layout-The window height on MacCatalyst must be adjusted to the maximum to scroll horizontally #23306
  • [MAUI] I2_Spacing - Updating the vertical and horizontal spacing, the layout of the second column will change #23305
  • [MAUI]When MesureFirstItem is selected, the image sizes of I3 and I6 are inconsistent. #23304
  • [MAUI] I1_Layout - Horoizontal grid for DataTemplate & Horoizontal grid for Text pages display only three-rows grid. #23303
  • [MAUI] I3_Sizing -After making relevant changes, the image layout displays abnormally #23302
  • [MAUI]I5-EmptyView- filter not responding. #23301
  • [MAUI] I1_Layout - The first row of Vertical list(RTL FlowDirection) isn't correctly aligned from right-to-left. #23300
  • [MAUI] I4_ Selection - The default items not highlight in Single Pre-selection and Multiple Pre-selection Page #23299
  • [MAUI] I10_Swipe- Favorite & Delete button function is not implemented. #23298
  • [MAUI] I2_Spacing - Updating the vertical list spacing value will cause the CollectionView spacing to change as well. #23297
  • [MAUI] I4_ Selection - Selected items are not highlighted #23296
  • [MAUI] I CollectionView - After selecting an item in a subpage once, you cannot select any other items when you back #23295
  • [MAUI] I CollectionView - The layout and rendering of subpages are not displayed correctly #23294
  • [MAUI] I6 Grouping - 'Grouping for Vertical list without DataTemplates' page loading exception #23293
  • InvalidOperationException: Error: There is no browser renderer with ID 3. #23292
  • CarouselView - iOS - Changing Position no longer works after navigation away then coming back #23291

Closed

  • TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped fired multiple times on Android when GestureRecognizers were changed after rendering. #23177
  • MAUI App Scaling Issue on Windows #23065
  • Android entry handler not working anymore in .net8 #22997
  • Secondary Order ToolbarItems not displayed correctly on iOS #14559
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Performance of gesture updating #21449
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix select-all Entry select logic #23329
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-entry
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23328
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `MauiWinUIWindow` #23327
  • [tests] test a lot more things in `MemoryTests.cs` #23324
    memory-leak 💦, testing-missing-tests
  • Add MSBuild glob for Windows Assets #23314
    area-single-project, platform/windows 🪟
  • Don't let Glide clear the old image on Android ImageView unless we get an error #23313
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net9.0-preview6] Updated versions and fixes #23323
  • [Android] Avoid double event subscribes in gesture manager #23242
  • [Windows] Improve performance in accessibility extensions #22698
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform, t/perf
  • Null terminate iOS TabbedRenderer #23289
    area-controls-tabbedpage
  • [main] Null terminate iOS TabbedRenderer #23290
    area-controls-tabbedpage
  • Do not include Maui.InTree.targets for an AspNet.Core project #23246

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
  • [Windows] Respect `ClearButtonVisibility = ClearButtonVisibility.Never` for `<Entry>`s #23158
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Make sure that `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` folder exists in unpackaged #23265
    community ✨
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) (take 2) #22108
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `TabbedPage` #23281
    area-controls-tabbedpage, memory-leak 💦
  • Minor optimization for `MergedStyle.SetStyle` #21540
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Add an API for creating instances of TypedBinding #23239
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-templates
  • [Binding SG] Split bindings source generated code into multiple files #23116
    area-xaml
  • [tests] Analyzer / code fix provider for UITest [Test] without [Category] #23287
    area-infrastructure, area-testing
  • Add mapper for IsSwipePagingEnabledProperty on Android #23129
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Enable RefreshView Tests #23181
    area-testing
  • Fixes #18204 border lagging behind content on iOS and improves initial render performance #23156
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [X] Dont SetBinding for values returned by OnIdiom #23272
    area-xaml

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid reference between parent and child entities #34106
  • Cosmos no longer supports Dictionary with TValue type of primitive collection #34105
  • New EFCore Provider Translate Date addition/subtraction #34104
  • Cosmos: WithPartitionKey() is ignored when executing query via ReadItem #34102
    9.0.0
  • EF Core Migration Issue: Column Already Exists #34101

Closed

  • Fix tests using current culture #22901
    Backlog
  • Support Shadow Properties in Bulk Updates #34099
  • System.InvalidOperationException in EnsureCreated() function #34094
  • Tests failing because of different locales #14912
    9.0.0
  • EF 8 Migrations adds AlterColumn to every column, for subsequent migrations #34086

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement Cosmos pagination #34103
  • Update getting-and-building-the-code.md #34100

Merged

  • Simplify and improve null semantics rewrites #34072

Updated

  • Simplify `COALESCE` based on the nullability of its arguments #33938
  • Use XOR to translate some NOT expressions #34080
